languages.text: Вам знакомы телесные искажения на телах нападавших. Перед вами такие же мутанты-выродки, как те, чей заговор вы расследуете.
The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.
languages.original_text: Вам знакомы телесные искажения на телах нападавших. Перед вами такие же мутанты-выродки, как те, чей заговор вы расследуете.

traits.locale_text: The attackers' bodily disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant anathemas just like the ones whose plot you're investigating.
The attackers' bodily disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant anathemas just like the ones whose plot you're investigating.
The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.

The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.

languages.text: Las deformidades de los atacantes te resultan familiares: son abominaciones mutantes, como los responsables del complot que estás investigando.
languages.original_text: The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.

traits.locale_text: Las deformidades de los atacantes te resultan familiares: son abominaciones mutantes, como los responsables del complot que estás investigando.

languages.text: 襲撃者の形態破壊には見覚えがあるだろう。これはあなたが調査している陰謀の黒幕と同じ変異体忌まわしきものだ。
languages.original_text: The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.

traits.locale_text: 襲撃者の形態破壊には見覚えがあるだろう。これはあなたが調査している陰謀の黒幕と同じ変異体忌まわしきものだ。

languages.text: 袭击者身上的残损痕迹看起来非常眼熟。这些人都是变种人，正是你在调查的那批叛乱分子。
languages.original_text: The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.

traits.locale_text: 袭击者身上的残损痕迹看起来非常眼熟。这些人都是变种人，正是你在调查的那批叛乱分子。

languages.text: Die Entstellungen der Angreifer kommen dir bekannt vor. Das sind die mutierte Abscheulichkeiten, deren Intrige du auf den Grund gehen willst.
languages.original_text: The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.

traits.locale_text: Die Entstellungen der Angreifer kommen dir bekannt vor. Das sind die mutierte Abscheulichkeiten, deren Intrige du auf den Grund gehen willst.

languages.text: Les déformations de l'assaillant vous sont familières. Ce sont les mêmes abominations mutées que celles qui ont ourdi un complot contre vous.
languages.original_text: The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.

traits.locale_text: Les déformations de l'assaillant vous sont familières. Ce sont les mêmes abominations mutées que celles qui ont ourdi un complot contre vous.

languages.text: Saldırganların bedenlerindeki bozulma sana tanıdık geliyor. Tıpkı komplolarını araştırdıkların gibi bunlar da ucube mutantlar.
languages.original_text: The attackers' disfigurements look familiar to you. These are mutant abominations, just like the ones whose plot you are investigating.
